name: Note AI
description: AI-powered note-taking application with intelligent organization
abstract:
Note AI is an intelligent note-taking application that leverages artificial intelligence to help users organize, search, and enhance their notes. The application uses natural language processing to automatically categorize notes, generate summaries, and provide smart search capabilities.

name: Shin Kazamatsu
description: E-commerce platform for Japanese art and collectibles
abstract:
Shin Kazamatsu is a specialized e-commerce platform dedicated to Japanese art, collectibles, and cultural items. The platform provides a curated marketplace for authentic Japanese products with detailed descriptions, high-quality images, and secure payment processing.

name: Task Manager Pro
description: Advanced task management system with team collaboration
abstract:
Task Manager Pro is a comprehensive project management tool designed for teams. It offers kanban boards, Gantt charts, time tracking, and real-time collaboration features to help teams stay organized and productive.

name: Blog Platform
description: Modern blogging platform with markdown support
abstract:
A full-featured blogging platform that allows users to create, edit, and publish blog posts with markdown support. The platform includes features like syntax highlighting, image uploads, SEO optimization, and social sharing.

name: Fitness Tracker
description: Comprehensive fitness and workout tracking application
abstract:
Fitness Tracker is a comprehensive application for tracking workouts, monitoring progress, and achieving fitness goals. It includes exercise libraries, workout plans, progress charts, and integration with fitness wearables.

**Key Features:**

name: Portfolio-generator
abstract:
Let's be honestâ€”you're busy building awesome projects ğŸ’», but updating your portfolio? That's always "on the list" ğŸ“. When opportunity knocks ğŸšª (job applications, freelance gigs, or just showing off your work), you're stuck spending hours writing descriptions, grabbing screenshots ğŸ“¸, and manually updating everything. Sound familiar? ğŸ˜… 

This portfolio generator has your back! It automatically syncs with your GitHub repositories, pulls project details straight from your README files, and keeps everything fresh without you lifting a finger. You keep coding, and your portfolio stays updated. It's that simple.

**Key Features:**
- ğŸš€ **Automatic GitHub Integration** - Syncs your repos weekly and shows off both public and private projects (just add a token). Your portfolio grows as you code!
- ğŸ¯ **Smart README Parsing** - Already wrote a great README? Perfect! This tool grabs descriptions, images, tech stacks, and abstracts from your existing files. Write once, use everywhere.
- ğŸ¨ **Configurable Page Styles** - Pick from sleek, professionally designed layouts (Default, Aesthetic, with more on the way!). Switch themes in seconds with one environment variable.
